1.0.name: wordpress/formatted-post
1.0.description: This plugin is to help people who need to post with fixed,complicated format regularly, Insteading of using post_meta,it just replcace text with words wrapped in #,and save it as a new post to preserve more room to modify. If there is bug,or problem ,suggestion,mail me:guankiro@gmail.com or leave comment http://kiro.twbbs.org/wp/?p=504
